content: cattitude coaster a purr-fectly playful coaster with a dash of cattitude pattern designed by kami tomczak kami crochet introduction the cattitude coaster was a happy accident i was crocheting a simple circle when i ran out of yarn and decided to switch colors to continue lo and behold - the cat face appeared in front of me it was as if the yarn had a personality of its own guiding me toward this spicy design this coaster not only adds a touch of playfulness to your home but also carries the spirit of creativity and improvisation i hope you enjoy making it as much as i did di�culty
